SEARCH
Package org.cloudbus.cloudsim.container.containerProvisioners

Class ContainerBwProvisioner

java.lang.Object
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.container.containerProvisioners.ContainerBwProvisioner
Direct Known Subclasses:
ContainerBwProvisionerSimple
public abstract class ContainerBwProvisioner extends Object
ContainerBwProvisioner is an abstract class that represents the provisioning policy of bandwidth to containers inside a vm. When extending this class, care must be taken to guarantee that the field availableBw will always contain the amount of free bandwidth available for future allocations.
Author:
Rodrigo N. Calheiros, Sareh Fotuhi Piraghaj
